message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I get a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation each round.
Your cut decreases with each round Alice, let's settle this now. 45/55.
Bob, I'm losing money with every round. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
This is becoming ridiculous Alice. Accept this now and we both win, before inflation eats your share.
Bob, I'm taking a hit on my end to make this happen. It's time to be realistic.
Alice, let's end this. 50/50 is the fairest it's going to get. Take it before your share shrinks even more!
